pages.text: When our revelations recited them those nie expect schodza us say Bring Quran this zmenit it Say ja possibly nie zmenit it on moj own Ja len nasledovat co revealed mna! Ja fear ja disobey moj Lord retribution awesome dni
(Say Had GOD willed ja nie recited it ona nor would ona zauzlit anything it Ja zivy ona whole zivot this ona zauzlit mi mat rad sane truthful clovek). Ona nie chapat
Kto bol zly than jeden fabricates laicky GOD zavrhnut Jeho revelations. Istota transgressors never succeed

They kult GOD idols possess power harm them benefit them they say These je our intercessors GOD Say Je ona informovat GOD z nieco He nie zauzlit heavens zem? He glorified He je the Vela High daleko above needing partners
Ludia pouzivat je 1 congregation potom they disputed it je for predetermined word z tvoj Lord they judged ihned ich disputes
They say "Ako pod ziaden zazrak pod him jeho Lord Say buduci belongs do GOD cakat ja cakat ona
